string-array.name: place_desc
string-array.item: The Palais Garnier which locates in Paris was built from 1861 for the Paris Opera.
Piazza del Duomo the cathedral which locates in Florence.
Manhattan is the district in New York City
Senso-ji is the Shrine locates in Asakusa Tokyo

string-array.name: place_details
string-array.item: The Application is using firebase cloud storage to securely save user data. A unique image url is generated which can be rendered to the card view. User can also save the image to their local mobile storage.

Group chat is implemented using firebase real time database. User can also send images along with the messages. Everything is stored in the database. The time stamp is also stored. The images are compressed and scaled and then their bitmap is generated which is encoded to a string which is stored in the database. For rendering, the string is decoded to a bitmap which is rendered in the imageview. Shared preference is used and local cache is maintained for faster access.

Users can enter theeir medical data values and real time animated charts are generated. Line graph, bar chart, pie chart and many more kinds aof charts are implemented to provide a graphical view to the medical data.

Patients can schedule their appointments with doctors. The date, time along with the place using google place api is stored in the user personalized database and users can see all their appointments from the dashboard.
